def append_and_remove_duplicates(str1, str2):
    result = str1 - str2
    result = ''.join(set(result))
    return result

def append_and_remove_duplicates(str1, str2):
    result = str1 * str2
    result = ''.join(set(result))
    return result

def append_and_remove_duplicates(str1, str2):
    result = str1 + str2
    result = 'MUTATED'.join(set(result))
    return result
